She adds a splash of vanilla extract (vanilla_extract_bottle_01), its sweet aroma mingling with the scent of coffee. Grabbing the whisk (whisk_01) from the rack above, she begins to whisk the ingredients together, the rhythmic sound filling the kitchen as the mixture transforms into a smooth, golden batter. Outside, the rain continues to fall, creating a perfect backdrop for a cozy morning in.
